name: Street Karate Fighter 2 Online
description:
One of the best fighting multiplayer games for your device!

Arcade Mode:
Fight against against 12 characters representing countries all over the world, to reach the two most powerful hidden fighters! In this mode you earn points to climb the "Arcade" leaderboard.

Online Mode:
Invite a friend or fight a random opponent online using the Game Centre to climb the "Online" leaderboard to become the most powerful player in the world!

Features:
- Arcade Mode (Single Player)
- Multiplayer Mode (Game Center)
- 3 Special Moves for each character
- 12 Different Characters
- Easy / Medium / Hard Difficulties
- SLAYRadio Music Streaming
- Continues
- Different Fireballs (special move)
- Facebook score and wins post
